jrPv5kNqwffNJ3h1.name: Brutal Disorientation
jrPv5kNqwffNJ3h1.description:
Requirements: A hand free, a flash bomb, ability to attack for bludgeoning damage

You slam the flash bomb directly into the creature’s head as you strike from the other side with a bludgeoning attack. Make a melee weapon attack that deals bludgeoning damage. On a hit, you expend the flash bomb, taking 1d4 points of fire damage, and the target takes an additional 1d6 points of fire damage and must make a Constitution saving throw against your maneuver DC. A creature that fails is blinded, rattled, confused, and poisoned until the end of its next turn. A creature that succeeds is poisoned, rattled, and has disadvantage on Perception checks until the end of its next turn instead.
